title: Image analysis of patient data from the hybrid photoacoustic-ultrasound tomography system PAM3
details: B De Santi, F Lucka, R Bulthuis, J Veltman… - Photons Plus Ultrasound …, 2025
abstract: The PAM3 system is a hybrid photoacoustic-ultrasound system for imaging the breast. The ultrasound mode enables extraction of speed-of-sound (SOS) maps that can be used to improve photoacoustic (PA) reconstruction. SOS holds information …

abstract: The aim of the photoacoustic tomography (PAT) inverse problem is to reconstruct the initial pressure distribution from measured ultrasound waves generated by absorption of externally induced pulse of near-infrared light. Image reconstruction …

title: Hybrid photoacoustic and ultrasound tomography: ground truth validation (Conference Presentation)
details: F Lucka, M Dantuma, S Kruitwagen, A Javaherian… - Photons Plus Ultrasound …, 2025
abstract: The PAM3 breast imaging system enables photoacoustic and ultrasound tomography. The ultrasound mode creates 3D sound speed maps using time-of-flight tomography or a Full-Waveform Inversion framework. To evaluate the accuracy of our …
